name: manual-portal
description: VFD Manual Monitoring portal built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS

scripts.clean-unused: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue'; Remove-Item -LiteralPath 'data/manuals.js' -Force; Remove-Item -LiteralPath 'public/manuals/abb-acs880/manual.pdf' -Force; Remove-Item -LiteralPath 'public/manuals/abb-acs880/img-4.svg' -Force; if (Test-Path '_backup_20250922_212406') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force -LiteralPath '_backup_20250922_212406' }"
